.. _`design_system_components_preview`:

Preview
=======

.. figure:: images/component_preview.png
   :align: center


Description
-----------

Components that provide a resizeable 3D viewer of a model.
The viewer can be navigated with mouse and modifier keys to pan, rotate and zoom the view
or the integrated navigation cube control.
Optionally displays a semi-transparent :ref:`design_system_components_structuretree` overlay
that defines the object structure.
Plain, borderless and :ref:`design_system_components_contentblock` layout are provided.


API Documentation
-----------------

:ref:`cs-threed-hoops-web-cockpit-components.Preview.Preview`

:ref:`cs-threed-hoops-web-cockpit-components.PreviewPanel.__default__`


Related Components
------------------
